urldecode.io
============

<http://urldecode.io/>

Backbone.js website for decoding and encoding URLs

### Run Server
`ruby app.rb`

### SASS
`sass --watch assets/stylesheets/app.scss:public/stylesheets/application.css`

### Coffeescript
`coffee -w -c -j application.js -o public/javascripts/ assets/javascripts/`
